name: div
features: SmartFlex: Flexible during play, hardens on impact
Pre-curved Ergonomic Shape: For a lightweight, form-fitting design
Internal Protection : Engineered internal shell retains shape & enhances impact protection
Wrap-Around Design: For superior elbow & upper arm protection
Comfort : Foam layer for added comfort with sleeveless construction for easy on/off
Materials : Cushioned mesh lining & moisture-wicking, UPF 50+ compression fabric
Official Status : Official Protective Equipment Supplier of Major League Baseball
